channel.title: [pi] dspk duel arena
channel.description: Hello there are 2 bugs with duel arena on my server divine-scape first one is that you can use veng in arena even if magic is turned off and you can veng before fight and it carries over into duel also bug number 2 is that when you are counting down like "3,2,1 FIGHT" you can attack even before count down is finished please help ill reward you

item.title: [pi] dspk duel arena
item.dc:creator: @Owner_John_Clark Owner John Clark
item.description:
@Owner_John_Clark wrote:

tehsandbox:

Hello there are 2 bugs with duel arena on my server divine-scape first one is that you can use veng in arena even if magic is turned off and you can veng before fight and it carries over into duel also bug number 2 is that when you are counting down like “3,2,1 FIGHT” you can attack even before count down is finished please help ill reward you

Add a freezetimer at the begining, to see how ctrl+f “timer” and look for the one used on a barrage, then start a freeze timer at the beginning of the duel, set it to 3 seconds

Read full topic
